errors.formattedMessage: contracts/Token.sol: Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
errors.message: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.
Function state mutability can be restricted to pure

documentation.text:
Contract initialization.
 The `constructor` is executed only once when the contract is created.

A function to transfer tokens.
 The `external` modifier makes a function *only* callable from outside
 the contract.

Read only function to retrieve the token balance of a given account.
 The `view` modifier indicates that it doesn't modify the contract's
 state, which allows us to call it without executing a transaction.

A function for creating tokens from thin air and adding them to 
 the sender's balance
